content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I asked the AI to Google Clockify time tracking software and received a list of results including a website, an app, and a Chrome extension.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://clockify.me/", "question": "Can you provide more information about the Clockify time tracking software?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for Clockify, a free time tracking software that allows users to track work hours across projects, manage tasks and projects, and communicate with teams. The software offers various features such as timekeeping, timesheets, calendar, auto tracker, reporting, management, invoicing, and expenses. It works across devices and can be used for boosting productivity, billing clients, managing teams, and streamlining processes. The software has received positive reviews from users and offers 24/7 customer support.\n\nLinks: [' (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nClockify\\nTime and cost tracking\\n\\n\\n (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPlaky\\nProject and task management\\n\\n\\n (https://plaky.com/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPumble\\nTeam communication and collaboration\\n\\n\\n (https://pumble.com/)', ' (https://cake.com/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
